relation.text: s Octobr : 6 th 1787
was kept up
liked writi n g , had good Eyes -- & had nothi n g else to do -- now
kn now
this year no nor any year -- it is decided
will come but for a short time
bred one of the present age -- but I am quite in love to with the dear Boys , particularly not little , but great Ld C . who is the tallest Boy of 3 & ½ years
was seen
was put into Breeches at 13 Months
now in Dorsetshire at at Wm 's , from whence I fancy they intend
now gone
happened near two Months ago
had suffered much , for Months
does not leave that part of the world , till the end of November
stayed with us till last Wednesday
return again to Horton on Monday
s & then to St Leonards where I have not yet been this year
a few Days excepted
Nov : I return
returns in November
